motivationalQuotes.author: Steve Jobs
motivationalQuotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.

motivationalQuotes.author: Winston Churchill
motivationalQuotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

motivationalQuotes.author: Sam Levenson
motivationalQuotes.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.

motivationalQuotes.author: Vidal Sassoon
motivationalQuotes.quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.

motivationalQuotes.author: Henry David Thoreau
motivationalQuotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.

motivationalQuotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt
motivationalQuotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

motivationalQuotes.author: Roy T. Bennett
motivationalQuotes.quote: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.

motivationalQuotes.author: Winston S. Churchill
motivationalQuotes.quote: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.

motivationalQuotes.author: C.S. Lewis
motivationalQuotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

motivationalQuotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
motivationalQuotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.

motivationalQuotes.author: Charles Kingsleigh
motivationalQuotes.quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.

motivationalQuotes.author: Chris Grosser
motivationalQuotes.quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.

motivationalQuotes.author: Thomas Jefferson
motivationalQuotes.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.

motivationalQuotes.author: Booker T. Washington
motivationalQuotes.quote: Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome.

motivationalQuotes.author: Joshua J. Marine
motivationalQuotes.quote: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.

motivationalQuotes.author: Vince Lombardi
motivationalQuotes.quote: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.

motivationalQuotes.author: Charles Kingsleigh
motivationalQuotes.quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.

motivationalQuotes.author: Thomas Jefferson
motivationalQuotes.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.

motivationalQuotes.author: Joshua J. Marine
motivationalQuotes.quote: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.

motivationalQuotes.author: Michael Jordan
motivationalQuotes.quote: Obstacles don't have to stop you. If you run into a wall, don't turn around and give up. Figure out how to climb it, go through it, or work around it.

motivationalQuotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt
motivationalQuotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

motivationalQuotes.author: Henry David Thoreau
motivationalQuotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.

motivationalQuotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
motivationalQuotes.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.

motivationalQuotes.author: Confucius
motivationalQuotes.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

motivationalQuotes.author: Chris Grosser
motivationalQuotes.quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.

motivationalQuotes.author: Zig Ziglar
motivationalQuotes.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.

motivationalQuotes.author: William Butler Yeats
motivationalQuotes.quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.

motivationalQuotes.author: Winston S. Churchill
motivationalQuotes.quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.

motivationalQuotes.author: Napoleon Hill
motivationalQuotes.quote: The starting point of all achievement is desire.

motivationalQuotes.author: Maya Angelou
motivationalQuotes.quote: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.

motivationalQuotes.author: Jim Rohn
motivationalQuotes.quote: Don't wish it were easier, wish you were better.

motivationalQuotes.author: Oprah Winfrey
motivationalQuotes.quote: You become what you believe.

motivationalQuotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
motivationalQuotes.quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.

motivationalQuotes.author: Albert Einstein
motivationalQuotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

motivationalQuotes.author: Helen Keller
motivationalQuotes.quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.

motivationalQuotes.author: Vincent van Gogh
motivationalQuotes.quote: Great things are not done by impulse but by a series of small things brought together.

motivationalQuotes.author: John C. Maxwell
motivationalQuotes.quote: You'll never change your life until you change something you do daily. The secret of your success is found in your daily routine.

motivationalQuotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
motivationalQuotes.quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right – for you'll be criticized anyway.

motivationalQuotes.author: Thomas Edison
motivationalQuotes.quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.

motivationalQuotes.author: Denis Waitley
motivationalQuotes.quote: You must stick to your conviction, but be ready to abandon your assumptions.

motivationalQuotes.author: Zig Ziglar
motivationalQuotes.quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.

motivationalQuotes.author: Bruce Lee
motivationalQuotes.quote: Absorb what is useful, discard what is not, add what is uniquely your own.

motivationalQuotes.author: J.K. Rowling
motivationalQuotes.quote: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.

motivationalQuotes.author: Albert Schweitzer
motivationalQuotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.

motivationalQuotes.author: Dale Carnegie
motivationalQuotes.quote: Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.

motivationalQuotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl
motivationalQuotes.quote: Everything can be taken from a man but one thing: the last of the human freedoms—to choose one’s attitude in any given set of circumstances, to choose one’s own way.

motivationalQuotes.author: Malcolm X
motivationalQuotes.quote: Education is the passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.

motivationalQuotes.author: John Wooden
motivationalQuotes.quote: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.

motivationalQuotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
motivationalQuotes.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.

motivationalQuotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
motivationalQuotes.quote: Strength does not come from the body. It comes from the will.

motivationalQuotes.author: Nelson Mandela
motivationalQuotes.quote: I never lose. I either win or learn.

motivationalQuotes.author: Denis Waitley
motivationalQuotes.quote: Expect the best, plan for the worst, and prepare to be surprised.

motivationalQuotes.author: Les Brown
motivationalQuotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

motivationalQuotes.author: Coco Chanel
motivationalQuotes.quote: Success is most often achieved by those who don’t know that failure is inevitable.

motivationalQuotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
motivationalQuotes.quote: You must do the things you think you cannot do.

motivationalQuotes.author: Tony Robbins
motivationalQuotes.quote: The only limit to your impact is your imagination and commitment.

motivationalQuotes.author: Confucius
motivationalQuotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go, as long as you do not stop.

motivationalQuotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
motivationalQuotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

motivationalQuotes.author: Vincent van Gogh
motivationalQuotes.quote: I would rather die of passion than of boredom.

motivationalQuotes.author: Les Brown
motivationalQuotes.quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.

motivationalQuotes.author: Walt Disney
motivationalQuotes.quote: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.

motivationalQuotes.author: Maya Angelou
motivationalQuotes.quote: You may encounter many defeats, but you must not be defeated.

motivationalQuotes.author: Albert Einstein
motivationalQuotes.quote: Try not to become a person of success, but rather try to become a person of value.

motivationalQuotes.author: Jim Rohn
motivationalQuotes.quote: Success is doing ordinary things extraordinarily well.

motivationalQuotes.author: C.S. Lewis
motivationalQuotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

motivationalQuotes.author: Muhammad Ali
motivationalQuotes.quote: Don’t count the days, make the days count.

motivationalQuotes.author: Zig Ziglar
motivationalQuotes.quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.

motivationalQuotes.author: Robert H. Schuller
motivationalQuotes.quote: Tough times never last, but tough people do.

motivationalQuotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
motivationalQuotes.quote: You must do the thing you think you cannot do.

motivationalQuotes.author: Thomas Edison
motivationalQuotes.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
